mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.platform AS "platform", dict.label AS "platformName", a.category AS "category", a.type AS "type", a.description AS "description", a.url AS "url", a.userscript AS "userscript", a.match_expr AS "matchExpr", a.sort AS "sort", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_dict dict ON dict.`value` = a.platform and dict.type='platform'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_platform_source( id, platform, category, type, description, url, userscript, match_expr, sort, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{platform}, #{category}, #{type}, #{description}, #{url}, #{userscript}, #{matchExpr}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_platform_source SET platform = #{platform}, category = #{category}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, url = #{url}, userscript = #{userscript}, match_expr = #{matchExpr}, sort = #{sort}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
